data.title: Lydia Shum
data.meta_description: Lydia Shum. Actress: Siu Tai Gik. With her signature wing-tip frame coke bottle glasses and imposing coif, 'Zaftig' TV-movie comedienne and celebrity personality Lydia Shum also known as 'Ah-Fay' to her fans stands out as one of the most recognizable and endearing entertainment icons in Hong Kong society whose celebrity ubiquity has spanned nearly 5 decades since she began her career in the early 60s as a teenage contract actress...
data.text:
She was the first wife of Adam Cheng, by whom she had one daughter in the 1980s. After their divorce, she returned to films and television. She was co-host of the Hong King Film Award ceremonies for several years, TV host, and singer.

Veteran Hong Kong film star who started acting as a teenager, she became popular despite being overweight because of her good spirit, comedy talent and enormous energy.
